data.text: Last question of the day! Q4: What is the name of the flight from ICN-CGK and CGK-ICN on Asiana Airlines? :)
@KrismaAdiwibawa Tweet us your photo! :)
RT @dnristiati: Selamat Datang RT @AsianaAirlines: Q3: How do you say, "WELCOME~" in Indonesian? #ASIANAquiz
Q3: How do you say, "WELCOME~" in Indonesian? #ASIANAquiz
@boomersells27 Oops~ Guess again?
@iqbalbusran Beautiful view! :)
Thank you! RT @urbrataleks @AsianaAirlines Monas in Merdeka Square :) http://t.co/vHsgQvaEt7
Q2: What is the name of the historic monument located in central Jakarta? And do you have a photo of this monument?
Quiz Time! Q1: What is the capital and largest city of Indonesia?
Check out this cute OZ-inspired nail art courtesy of @kuroDEE! #fanart We love fan art! #asianaairlines #saekdongi http://t.co/bhZHyZdvf0
@DorianLovesYou Hopefully your wish will come true soon! :) Have a great week!
Good morning~! Wishing all of our followers a Happy Monday. Where will this week take you?
Grab a cup of tea and enjoy the ride! #asianaairlines #flyasiana http://t.co/BHFLtcxuxn
@miji0408 Once you're done with school, maybe you can fly everywhere you wish to go! Good luck! :)
@Skymasterfunk Well good morning to you, too! Hope the bbq treats you and your friends well. Have a great week! :)
How is everyone's weekend? Have you been flying? #asianaairlines #flyasiana
@kuroDEE We'd love to see the #Asiana manicure!
Mesmerizing photo by juanree :) What are your weekend getaway plans? #flyasiana #asianaairlines #regram http://t.co/dlTPvi1m7q
Fantastic photo! :) RT @mc36ruz: @AsianaAirlines Ready to take to the skies:) http://t.co/4I2uOsL6yF
RT @tweetbypremier: Our party hosted by Asiana Airlines in 2007 @AsianaAirlines #flashbackfriday https://t.co/T4IZ7Q4w4A
ASIANA CARGO! RT @DesieVanSteen: @AsianaAirlines http://t.co/s50lpGtPKc
@DesieVanSteen Wow~ it looks like you were very up close for this! Thanks for the photo~!
@Gabribkk What an artistic photo! Thanks! :)
RT @Gabribkk: Fantastic flight with @AsianaAirlines today to Tokyo. Thank you! :-) #firstclass #paxex #asiana http://t.co/TMdTI6B4lW
Looks like we may be going on a Regram/Retweet spree sometime soon! Tweet us your best #AsianaAirlines photos! :)
@no__musicnolife Great that you agree it's a remarkable photo! :D
Awesome photo by @toyrjnt1963! Thanks! http://t.co/l4Ms49Yygo
@super_ocean We don't have a chat system set up as of yet, but you can e-mail laxrr@flyasiana.com or call (800)227-4262 for assistance.
@ajobbins It usually takes 1~2 weeks for it to update. DM us your Asiana Club membership # and full name and we'll check the status of it.
@urbrataleks If you've never been before, Myeongdong, Hongdae, or Gangnam in Seoul are highly recommended shopping spots!
Interested in Russia? Check out the September issue of ASIANA in-flight magazine for amazing photos… http://t.co/JNokPyaH8U
@stephenflynn123 Any specific store or location within London?
We'd like to know: what's your favorite city to go shopping?
Good morning! Check out this awesome view of Angkor Wat submitted by @TravelMapper: http://t.co/Fz8dwZK1OB Thanks! #Cambodia #flyasiana
@TravelMapper WOW! This is beautiful!
@BedfordBootBoy Awesome! What's your favorite food to eat in Manila?
@arieshorse Those are three great cities~! What do you like about them?
Anyone feeling the Monday blues? Cheer up and think about traveling to your favorite city in the world. Where do you want to go?
@WAVEJourney Yes, flat-beds! SFO-ICN Business Class are equipped with the Business Smartium!
@shirotama45 TGIF to you too! Have a great weekend! :)
@m0sssy Thanks! :) Hope you have a good weekend!
Good morning, Happy Friday! Here's a photo of our fleet to start your day http://t.co/5ppoqLAvnY
Where would you like to fly next? #asianaairlines #flightattendant #airport http://t.co/zKJavSRNB9
@michaelrcks Contact (800)227-4262 for further information. Thank you!
@michaelrcks Give it about 8 days to post. If not, mail our Asiana Club department the original b/passes and itinerary to submit a claim.
Awesome- Thanks for flying with us! See you on board again soon! “@derloos: Gold with @AsianaAirlines. Thank you guys!”
@juanjosalguero That's a great addition to your collection you got there ;)
RT @juanjosalguero: No. 32 in my collection @AsianaAirlines @Airbus A330-300 1:200. One of my All Time Favorites Liveries. Got it today! ht…
@KamilStobiecki Hello! Be sure to give our reservations specialists a call in advance to assign seats together! (800) 227-4262
Happy Labor Day! We hope everyone is enjoying their day off. Anyone traveling with us?
@nan4bsb We hope to have you on board soon! :)
Thanks for this beautiful close-up! :D RT @Agiray: @asianaairlines #flyasiana #fly http://t.co/HaVDSLuhvL
@HeechulKim71083 Hello!
@SchwartzBoston Will send you a DM for further assistance!
Thanks for the awesome photo from LHR! RT @LHRlocal: An @AsianaAirlines #boeing777 landing in the evening at #London http://t.co/m9n5kZVTV5

#beats winner at #ASIANAatKCON booth! Come stop by for a chance to win! #asianaairlines #flyasiana… http://t.co/lzoQZo9ZWN

f(x) Amber with #ASIANAatKCON! #flyasiana #asianaairlines #kcon2013 @ Los Angeles Memorial Sports Arena http://t.co/nABbRQPI9q

@fareastdan Thank you for the kind compliments! :)
The crowd is buzzing at #KCON2013! Will you drop by our booth later in the afternoon? http://t.co/ORwj2GHsti
CONGRATS @hottestlyn! You've won our second pair of #KCON2013 tickets! We'll DM you for details. #ASIANAatKCON
@Won_Joon_Lee Have a great flight! :)
Do you still need tix to KCON? Tweet us your favorite kpop band and tell us why they're your favorite to win a pair of tix! #AsianaAtKCON
We're at LA Sports Arena setting up for KCON! Will you be here this weekend? #ASIANAatKCON http://t.co/424gs7qWro
@kjjenn sorry about that! Following!
Stay tuned for another chance at #KCON2013 tickets! #ASIANAatKCON
Congrats @kjjenn! Our first pair of #KCON2013 tickets goes to you! :) Follow and DM us for details! #ASIANAatKCON
Hey KPOP lovers-- we're giving away our first pair of #KCON2013 tickets! RT for your chance to win! #ASIANAatKCON http://t.co/ShAbsoAn9W
Thanks for the video! RT @AbraxasVideo: @AsianaAirlines 777-28EER departs Sydney - 2 October 2010 #Aviation #AvGeek http://t.co/fZbO7a2ioZ
We've got #KCON2013 tickets! #ASIANAatKCON Follow us for your chance to win! http://t.co/4XkUfXg94I
@ham547 Congrats! We're so glad to have worked with @kpopdreams to make your dream come true! :) Be sure to tweet us #ASIANAatKCON
Is anyone looking for #KCON2013 tickets? Keep on the lookout today, as we'll be giving away a couple tickets... ;) #ASIANAatKCON
We're ready to get excited with Kpop fans at #KCON2013! Follow us, Like us on Facebook, tag photos!… http://t.co/wvlB3rW5cN
Lookin' good! :) RT @GrimmSultze: ICN -> ORD #complete @AsianaAirlines ORD->CLT->ROA with @USAirways up next http://t.co/3G2tMOYuxM
@Deela25 We received word that artist line-up is subject to change without prior notice.
@joannchow3 The show will begin at 7:30pm. We'll release ticket information ASAP. There will be a Sky Festival website soon.
@brodeurprice Maybe next time! No need to make a sad face. :)
@yaknowitsmelo Awesome! There will be chances to win great prizes! :) Make sure to tweet us when you're there!
Yes we'll have a booth set up! :) RT @yaknowitsmelo: @AsianaAirlines right here this girl! Will you have a booth? I'll be sure to stop by!
Good morning! Do we have any followers who will be attending KCON in Los Angeles this weekend? We'll be there with great prizes!
@KTSN_5 The show will begin 7:30pm on Saturday, 9/14. Unfortunately, we do not know when exactly KARA will be on stage.
Passing through or flying out to ICN on 9/14? Kpop fans, you don't want to miss out on the Sky Festival! Read more: https://t.co/BdLYNZlDwb
Good morning! Happy Monday! Here's a photo of our cargo plane submitted by @markjohnson319, to start off your week: http://t.co/dBCjqRzc8M
@markjohnson319 Wow! Thanks for the photo! Lookin' good. ;)
@GrimmSultze Hope you enjoyed your flight with us! :)
Do you know what Samgyetang is? Read all about this scorching-summertime dish that Koreans indulge in,… http://t.co/zwRjYogmMA
@abbitravels Thanks for coming on board with us.. Hope you enjoyed your flight! :)
RT @abbitravels: Next leg of the journey #ICN to #SYD @asianaairlines 10 hours to Sydney. Then another 3 and I can go… http://t.co/z6dtHgSK…
Love our flight attendants? Re-watch this video made a few years back! #ThrowbackThursday https://t.co/KQ9zd9d9sx "~~Always With You~~"
Good morning, Tweeps! Happy Hump Day! Here's a photo of our B747 to start your day... http://t.co/D52ssr1l4m

@vasujain Looks like you finally got it! Congrats! :)

@dan7126 Awesome! Make sure to tweet us photos if you get the chance! :) Have a great trip!
